title: MOSDAC Feedback Meteorological Oceanographic Satellite Data Archival Centre
text: Detailed feedback can be sent to Web Information Manager/ Administrator at Contact Page Are you a registered user of MOSDAC? Yes No Type of use Frequent Optional Purpose of using the data Operational Research Informational How would you grade overall design of website Needs Improvement Good Excellent How would you grade the data ordering interface of website Needs Improvement Good Excellent Email ID Enter your valid Email Id Comments Math question 4 14 Solve this simple math problem and enter the result. E.g. for 1 3, enter 4.
